text: Tini'i apanara prati e'i kitaba nayila karechena yara kichu ayata ‘muh‌kama’, egulo kitabera mula; ara an'yagulo ‘mutasabih‌’ [1]. Sutaram yadera antare bakrata rayeche sudhu tara'i phetna ebam bhula byakhyara uddesye mutasabihatera anusarana kare [2]. Athaca allah‌ chara an'ya ke'u era byakhya jane na. Ara yara jnane sugabhira [3] tara bale, ‘amara egulote imana rakhi, saba'i amadera rabera kacha theke eseche’[4]; ebam jnana-bud'dhisampanna lokera chara ara ke'u upadesa grahana kare na
